Instructions:
1. The firmware used in JUXIN project is gx318l_h6_juxin_debug.pkg and gx318l_h6_juxin_release.pkg.

Version Info:
2024.05.11: Update firmware to temp version: v24.006.00018(GX316-7437: [Juxin] DVD3V switch to 1V8.)
2024.05.06: Update firmware to version: v24.005.00016
2024.03.22: Update firmware to version: v24.002.00011
2024.02.28: Update firmware to version: v24.002.00009
